mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_detail ( mem_num, name, passwd, phone, email, birth, gender, zipcode, address1, address2, push, certify_photo_name) VALUES ( #{mem_num}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{push}, #{certify_photo_name} )
mapper.select: SELECT mem_num, id, auth, nick_name, au_id, passwd, email, name FROM member LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail USING(mem_num) WHERE id=#{id}
